item.title: The cycloid as brachistochrone: A one-page proof, from first principles, without calculus
item.description: arXiv:2507.22548v1 Announce Type: cross Abstract: Johann Bernoulli's optical solution of the brachistochrone problem is rebuilt on underlying (non-optical) principles. An "optical interpretation" is given afterwards.
item.dc:creator: Gavin R. Putland

item.title: Arnol'd's limit and the Lagrange inversion
item.description: arXiv:2507.22743v1 Announce Type: cross Abstract: We show how to prove by means of the Lagrange inversion the limit of Arnol'd that $$ \lim_{x\to0}\frac{\sin(\tan x)-\tan(\sin x)}{\arcsin(\arctan x)-\arctan(\arcsin x)}=1\,. $$ In fact, we obtain a more general result in terms of formal power series.
item.dc:creator: Martin Klazar
